content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this reindeer is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70707ad corrections applied decrease 13 2007 skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 4 colors 1 ball each *taupe chocolate brick mustard* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish also available on michaels com lion brand crochet amigurumi reindeer 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20111224103939/http //www michaels com/lion-brand-crochet-amigurumi-reindeer/e07349 default pd html
